title: "park events"
output: github_document

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
```

```{r}
park_event = read.csv("./park_events.csv") %>% 
  select(event_id, title, date,start_time, end_time, cost_free)

park_location = read.csv("./park_location.csv") %>% 
  select(event_id, name, park_id, lat, long, borough)
  
park_organizer = read.csv("./park_organizer.csv") 
  

park = left_join(park_event, park_location, park_organizer, by = "event_id")
  
  
```
